info.name: Confluence Dark 2
info.description: A fork of Confluence Dark with tweaks to make text and labels clearer on high-res/scaled screens, fixed inverted image preview modals, and other quality of life improvements.
info.additionalInfo:
GitHub Change Log
  • 2017-05-03:Tweaks to make text and labels clearer on high-res/scaled screens, fixed inverted image preview modals.

data.title: I think it is a little bit too dark
Minor patch to fix editor issues
Minor patch to fix editor issues (now with code, put the margin and height in between curly braces
Great style overall, had some issues with the font
Great style overall, had some issues with the font
